issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: kahadb log files not deleted when exceptions are thrown by consumers

comments.body: I also tested against 5.4.1 and get the same problem
adding wiki markup to preserve code formating.
I wonder if it is possible to validate the issue with 5.5. I think the fix for https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/AMQ-2736 should have resolved this.
This appears to be a duplicate of AMQ-2736.  Closing because the provided test code isn't complete so can't confirm if its still an issue, please reopen if the problem reoccurs.
